name: Kitten Sitter
description:
Hello everyone,
this is our entry for the Ludum Dare 40 Jam!

This is a team project and a first timer for my friend (he did the graphics and the audio!) so please be nice to him ;)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

YOU NEED TO PLAY IN FULLSCREEN MODE!!!!
(or download the .zip ^^)

HOW TO PLAY:

- Click on a kitten to pick it up (only if its not hungry!)

- Click again to put it down.

- Move the camera by pushing your mouse to the edge of the screen

- Feed the kitten by clicking on the fridge and then on the kitten

- clean it by putting it into the bathtub.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Let's see who can handle the most kittens :)

As always: Feedback is appretiated and welcomed!!!
